name: Mortal Kombat Kollection
summary: This special collector's edition box set that combines three Mortal Kombat releases from the fighting franchise into one explosive package. Mortal Kombat: Kollection features Mortal Kombat: Deception, Mortal Kombat: Armageddon, and Mortal Kombat: Shaolin Monks, together packing more punch, fatalities and characters into one box than ever before
